title: How I feel playing Master Yi

replies.body: Too bad Flare is removed in S5
considering the amount of selfishness from from junglers it promotes, I will not shed a {{item:3070}}
Says every selfish laner who thinks the Jungler's only job is to gank for them.
Shots. Fired.

> Says every selfish laner who thinks the Jungler's only job is to gank for them.

junglers entire job is to control the map and be in the most opportune location at any given time.
I can promise it isnt wraiths, wolves, wight, repeat.

Actually, if the jungler works by scaling, that very well may be.

The jungler's job is not to be your babysitter. If you really need a babysitter you shouldn't be playing League, it's T for Teens not T for Toddlers.

I know that, and I don't think that total AFK farming is always the best, but in certain situations it does have its merits and advantages (I actually mostly enjoy tank/utility junglers and focus on map control, not necessarily ganks or farming, but keeping everything warded and keeping on point for counterganks). Ganking has a very specific play pattern, and farming jungle to carry is just as selfish as a laner who refuses to roam (which most people I ever get matched with struggle with severely). Feral flare has its problems, but just because it is a play style that is unusual in comparison to the norm (ganking) doesn't mean it is entirely bad or wrong. I totally agree that the jungle is about opportunism and being in the best spot at the best time, all I'm saying is that most laners have it in their head that that means always ganking their lane 100% of the time. Junglers may have the best options for ganking, but when it all comes down to it, it is a game based around HAVING FUN.
It lets them late game carry

They made this pretty clear at the start of season 4, the whole "jungler is just a roaming support" thing has been over, they are junglers who have playstyles of farming and building up towards late game.

> Says every selfish laner who thinks the Jungler's only job is to gank for them.

It's not necessarily to gank for them, but it IS to be useful in some way, shape or form. Which FF Junglers never, ever were. Ever.

They were if they were doing their job right and counter jungling to deny exp and Gold while throwing deep wards. That was the whole point but, low level junglers apparently don't know how to throw down wards or kill all but 1 in enemy camps to deny exp and gold.

^
How I feel when I jungle and people scream about me not ganking.


Top: 'Why don't you ever gank top?!'
Me: 'Because you're ALWAYS DEAD'

True conversation there.

If you've shoved your lane too far, I can't gank because the opportunity isn't there.
If I'm on the opposite side of the map, I can't gank because it would take too long to get to you, by which time the situation is resolved (positively or negatively). 
If you're dead and feeding, I can't gank because DIED and have made your lane opponent stronger than I can help you with.

If any of these three things have occurred, then there's a good chance I'm not going to show up. Just play safe, ward, and DON'T DIE.

That's all I ask for.

If I die because my lane is getting camped and I get dived, or I lose a tower when I had been asking for help from you Mr. too dumb to buy golem's fist and not worry about stupid ass feral flare jungler, it is your fault. A player death over losing a tower is a trade, a player not dying and a tower not getting taken IS a priority over getting stacks on feral flare.

"I don't know how to ward or tower farm. Clearing waves is also impossible. I have no idea how to play defensively and need my jungler to hold my hand instead of counter jungling and pressuring other lanes which is the proper choice when the enemy jungler is trying to unsuccessfully camp a lane."
Sometimes even with wards and safe play you can lose. When the enemy jungler and mid come in to your lane all day and your jungle is AFK farming it really sucks.
Then WTF is your middle doing? Fiddling his dink? Free towers and Creep score all day long. Free Dragons. Easy counter ganks and kill for mid.

^ Me everytime my bot lane over-pushes against Lucian/Thresh.  I ain't gonna turn a 3/0/2 Lucian into a 4/0/2 Lucian.  'Cuz that's what's gonna happen if I come down there at that point.  Hell, I'd almost wish you'd just give them the tower at that point, since you clearly aren't gonna be able to hold it long now.  At least now you can come help push another lane.
Every players job is to support the team. Farming a pack of wraiths for another stack on your Feral Flare over not letting an enemy take a tower or joining a team fight is NOT helping your team.

I never said it was. Only junglers who watch Trick2G and think that everything he says about disrespect and playing to carry and being selfish aren't supposed to be JOKES play like that. If/when I ever build a Feral flare, I still bank when there are good opportunities, I still call Dragon/Baron when it is a good time, I still counter jungle, and I still group and push objectives and team fight. The difference between Flare and other jungle items is that if you play the way it is supposed to be played, then it changes from a game of "Jungler vs all the other lanes" into "Jungler vs other jungler". Setting back the enemy junglier hard and then carrying does two things: 1 It sets you far ahead to carry. 2 It sets the other jungled far enough behind that even if they try to bank, they cannot be effective because they fall behind so quickly. Flare would be far more efficient at its intended role if they hadn't added a Camp and given everything gold generation passives, because counterjungling relies so heavily on starving the enemy jungler.

It is?  
Wooooooooooo!
No more obviously broken Udyrs?
I'm sorry if I'm more terrified of a Yi that's afk for the first ten minutes than any Udyr that isn't Trick2G
rip ww

Bruh S5 looks like it's going to be VERY good for Wolfie. With the camps providing utility he sorely needs, becoming tougher to push out the exotic junglers like {{champion:84}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:67}}  and  more to the natural sustain junglers {{champion:19}} {{champion:56}} {{champion:9}} {{champion:57}} , base stat increases focused on early levels, minions and towers losing resist gains, the Elixir of Ruin, Dragon being made more important for repeat kills (WW being one of the earliest candidates for soloing him atm), and Skirmisher's Saber allowing you to further increase your Ult damage? People forget there was a time where WW didn't take a jungle item at all because his kit is more than he needs to jungle effectively.
There are times where I forget to back as WW in the jungle just because I don't ever need to back. OOM or nah.
So true, I've ruined games because I forgot to grab {{item:3106}} into {{item:3160}} fast enough.
hes getting a rework
He will
One that has the new jungle in mind. Zenon wouldn't do anything to destroy his identity as one of the game's best sustain junglers.
Udyr actually has the earliest solo Dragon. Blue, Wolves, Red, level 3 Solo Dragon.
Operative words: "one of". Udyr can do it at 3, WW can do it at 4. Not many other champs can do that.
Fid can do it at lvl 4
....Operative words: "Not many". As in few, but not limited to 1.

It's k, we have BoRK, which is just straight up better on attack speed champions.

Oh no wait, it's not k ;_;
wait IT IS {{champion:77}}  is dead then {{item:3070}}

Maybe that's for the best, but I'm apprehensive about the jungle changes.

I hope team-oriented/tank junglers are able to stand up to the assassins and gank kings.
Not too bad. Too good.
is this when people realise wits end is literally a flare with 17 stacks since it deals 42 magic damage per hit
I've tried Flare> Wits End Yi a couple times and it is a lot better than one would think.  A cheap, early-midgame power spike.

> is this when people realise wits end is literally a flare with 17 stacks since it deals 42 magic damage per hit

Except Wit's End doesn't deal triple damage to Super Minions. Feral Flare us great for stalling games out that would normally be over.
Well when Wits End doesn't have a Recurve Bow in its recipe, people will look at it a lot more.

Wow. Okay, "jungle mains" here who are promoting FF have nooo clue what they're talking about.

My main roles are top/mid/jungle, and I'm stupidly proficient in jungle. I can beat out low Diamonds in Ranked with my Jungle, and with over 6000 games played of League, I think I have enough experience to say...

Flare is stupid.

It really is. It was a great concept for Tryn/Yi Jungle, but it's stupid otherwise. Note I said concept, not actuality. It's good in theory for farm-heavy junglers, in actuality the item is pretty toxic in design.

Laners aren't "babied" for expecting ganks, your job is to have pressure as a jungler, period, end of story. If you're farming a flare you better DAMN well have some good late game pressure EVERY single game. As a jungle main I honestly think it's one of the biggest bullshit items in the game, as every single jungler who fails with it then goes "Well, woulda won that game if my team held their own."

No, what that means is if your team triple-quadruple warded to eliminate any ganks whatsoever that puts them in a spot they can't recover from, didn't get coordinated in a tower dive against them, and put up with a lot less pressure, then maybe, maybe you might be noticeably strong enough to have a bit more carry potential.

I hate the item. 

There are some people who manage to have good pressure with it, who help their team take towers, make a few very decisive ganks, who absolutely control Dragon and Baron, and those people are awesome, but they are few and far between.

Making League a PvE game because you hate interaction doesn't suddenly mean you can blame your team because everyone else is PvP'ing.

You are absolutely correct. I feel like people forget this is a team game.

Counter jungling is great and all, but one of the jungler's primary roles is ganking. AFK Farming a feral flare when you could be taking tower, or dragon or scoring a double or even triple with your team is just a joke. A jungler needs to know that they participate in a team game. It's 5v5, not 1vJungle.

how i feel playing OLAF

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YG1FkuiCXVk
I got 55 kills with yi once. It was glorious
This deserves more attention. I actually laughed when I saw that picture.
